name: Soccer Slider & Match 3
description:
Test your reaction and agility in this exciting soccer themed swap and matching game, featuring three different and addictive modes. Use awesome power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous soccer packed levels as you try your hardest to be top of the league.

FEATURES

* Soccer theme.
* Super-charged match-3 puzzle game play.
* Uniquely different modes; Arcade, Score Panic and Zen
* Each mode is easy to learn, yet hard to master.
* Amazing power ups and special effects.
* Auto hint if you get stuck.
* Progress is saved in every mode - try out the different modes without losing your saves.

ARCADE MODE
Fast paced soccer matching fun is on offer in the Arcade mode. Test your skill and reflexes as you race to complete the level before the timer overpowers you.

SCORE PANIC
Can you reach the target score before your time runs out? The target score is increased after every level making this mode more and more challenging. Just don't panic!

ZEN
Relax and chill in Zen mode, without a timer to harry and panic, you can lay back and focus on an addictive, never ending game of match.
